extracted_playbook.title: Keep Systems Updated and Patched
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all systems and products are updated and patched as soon as possible after patches are released. Consider using a centralized patch management system to automate and expedite the process.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove or Isolate Compromised Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Immediately remove or isolate suspected compromised devices from the network.

extracted_playbook.title: Segment Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Segment networks to limit or block lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Network Services
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused or unnecessary network services, ports, protocols, and devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Multifactor Authentication (MFA)
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce MFA for all users, without exception, and on all VPN connections. If MFA is unavailable, enforce password complexity requirements.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Strict Password Requirements
extracted_playbook.description: Implement strict password requirements, enforcing password complexity, changing passwords at a defined frequency, and performing regular account reviews to ensure compliance.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Regular Data Backup
extracted_playbook.description: Perform regular data backup procedures and maintain up-to-date incident response and recovery procedures.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable External Management Capabilities
extracted_playbook.description: Disable external management capabilities and set up an out-of-band management network.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Internet-facing Services
extracted_playbook.description: Isolate Internet-facing services in a network Demilitarized Zone (DMZ) to reduce the exposure of the internal network.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Robust Logging for Internet-facing Services
extracted_playbook.description: Enable robust logging of Internet-facing services and monitor the logs for signs of compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Dedicated Management Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that you have dedicated management systems and accounts for system administrators. Protect these accounts with strict network policies.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Robust Logging and Review of Network Infrastructure
extracted_playbook.description: Enable robust logging and review of network infrastructure accesses, configuration changes, and critical infrastructure services performing authentication, authorization, and accounting functions.

extracted_playbook.title: Scrutinize Network Infrastructure Accesses
extracted_playbook.description: Upon responding to a confirmed incident within any portion of a network, response teams should scrutinize network infrastructure accesses, evaluate potential lateral movement to network infrastructure and implement corrective actions commensurate with their findings.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Password Complexity Requirements
extracted_playbook.description: If MFA is unavailable, enforce password complexity requirements.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Regular Account Reviews
extracted_playbook.description: Perform regular account reviews to ensure compliance with password and access policies.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Up-to-date Incident Response Procedures
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain up-to-date incident response and recovery procedures.

extracted_playbook.title: Set Up Out-of-band Management Network
extracted_playbook.description: Set up an out-of-band management network to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Logs for Signs of Compromise
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor logs for signs of compromise to detect potential security incidents.
